name: Mohalla Restaurant
description: {'Information': ['Mohalla is a vibrant Indian street food restaurant originating from Dubai, now with two branches in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.', 'The name "Mohalla" translates to "my neighborhood" or "my community," reflecting its commitment to creating a communal dining experience that brings people together through authentic Indian flavors.'], 'Location': ['The Esplanade Mall: Prince Turki Bin Abdulaziz Al Awal Road, Riyadh 12371, Saudi Arabia.', 'Riyadh Front: King Khalid International Airport Road, Riyadh 11564, Saudi Arabia.'], 'Main Features': ["Authentic Ambiance: Mohalla's décor is inspired by the lively streets of India, featuring colorful tapestries, hand-painted murals depicting Indian street scenes, and a mix of wooden tables and plush seating.", 'Indoor and Outdoor Seating: Both locations offer indoor seating with vibrant interiors, and outdoor areas providing pleasant dining experiences.', 'Family-Friendly Environment: The restaurant caters to families and groups, emphasizing a communal dining atmosphere.'], 'Main Dishes': ['Avocado Papdi Chaat: A modern twist on a traditional snack, featuring crispy wafers topped with avocado and chutneys.', 'Delhi 6 Butter Chicken: A rich and creamy tomato-based curry with tender chicken pieces.', 'Chicken Tikka Biryani: A flavorful rice dish layered with marinated chicken tikka pieces.', 'Mutton Kosha: A slow-cooked Bengali-style mutton curry with aromatic spices.'], 'Working Hours': ['Riyadh Front Branch: Saturday to Wednesday: 1:00 PM to 1:00 AM; Thursday and Friday: 1:00 PM to 2:00 AM.', 'The Esplanade Mall Branch: Daily from 1:00 PM to 1:00 AM.']}
short_description: Catch22 offers a lively dining experience with a diverse menu and creative presentations, making it a popular choice for families and friends in Riyadh.

name: Catch22 Restaurant
description: {'Information': ["Catch22 is a vibrant and family-friendly restaurant in Riyadh, offering a diverse menu that blends international flavors with creative presentations. The restaurant's eclectic décor, featuring elements like skateboards and comic-inspired art, creates a lively and engaging atmosphere for diners."], 'Location': ['The Zone: Takhassusi Street, Al Mohammadiyyah, Riyadh 12364, Saudi Arabia.', 'Nakheel Mall: Al Mughrizat District, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.'], 'Main Features': ['Diverse Menu: Offers a wide range of dishes, including burgers, sushi, pasta, and fusion cuisine.', 'Interactive Dining: Features unique presentations like the "Kitchen Sink" dessert, which includes a faucet of flowing chocolate over ice cream and brownies, enhancing the dining experience.', 'Family-Friendly Environment: Provides a fun atmosphere with quirky elements such as a photo booth and playful tableware for children.'], 'Main Dishes': ['Burgers: Variety of options, including the "Fully Loaded Chicken Burger" and "Truffle Up Burger."', 'Sushi: Selection of sushi rolls catering to different tastes.', 'Pasta: Dishes like "Fresh Seafood Pasta" featuring shrimp, mussels, and calamari.', 'Signature Desserts: Notable for creative desserts like the "Kitchen Sink."'], 'Working Hours': ['The Zone Branch: Sunday to Thursday: 11:00 AM – 1:00 AM; Friday and Saturday: 11:00 AM – 1:30 AM.', "Nakheel Mall Branch: Operating hours may vary; it's advisable to contact the branch directly for precise timings."]}
short_description: Catch22 offers a lively dining experience with a diverse menu and creative presentations, making it a popular choice for families and friends in Riyadh.

name: Labash Restaurant
description: {'Information': ['Known for its lively and interactive dining atmosphere, Labash brings a distinctive approach to traditional shawarma by allowing guests to engage in the preparation process at their tables.'], 'Location': ['Labash is located at Century Corner on King Fahd Road in the Al Olaya district of Riyadh.'], 'Main Features': ['Table-Side Shawarma Grilling: Guests can enjoy mini shawarma stations at their tables, featuring slow-roasted chicken or beef served with seasoned fries.', 'Casual Dining Atmosphere: The restaurant offers a fun and engaging environment, encouraging diners to enjoy their meals hands-on.'], 'Main Dishes': ['Mashrama: The signature table-side shawarma experience with options for chicken or beef.', 'Fried Chicken Spreads: Crispy fried chicken served atop seasoned fries.', 'Grilled Meat Skewers: Including fillets and burger skewers.'], 'Working Hours': ['Saturday to Wednesday: 4:00 PM – 12:00 AM.', 'Thursday to Friday: 4:00 PM – 1:00 AM\u200b.']}
short_description: Labash offers an interactive dining experience with table-side shawarma grilling, bringing Egyptian fast-food flair to Riyadh.

description: {'Information': ['Five Saving Mall is a modern shopping destination in Riyadh offering a variety of retail stores and services.'], 'Main Features': ['Wide range of stores including fashion, electronics, and beauty.', 'Entertainment facilities.'], 'Main products': ['Fashion retailers.', 'Electronics stores.', 'Beauty and cosmetics shops.'], 'Working Hours': ['Typically from 10:00 AM to 10:00 PM, but can vary.']}

name: Zal Market
description: {'Information': ['Souk Al Zal is a historic market offering a wide range of traditional goods, including antiques, carpets, spices, perfumes, jewelry, and handmade crafts.', 'It is a popular destination for tourists and locals alike who seek authentic Saudi products and cultural souvenirs.', 'Located in the heart of Riyadh, near Al-Masmak Fortress, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.'], 'Main Features': ['Traditional Souvenirs: Offers items like traditional clothing, handwoven carpets, and authentic handicrafts.', 'Local Spices and Perfumes: A variety of traditional Arabian perfumes and spices.', 'Antiques and Jewelry: A wide selection of antiques and silver jewelry.', "Cultural Experience: A true reflection of Riyadh's heritage and traditions."], 'Main products': ['Carpet and Textile Stores: Known for high-quality handmade carpets.', 'Perfume Stores: Selling Arabian oud, perfumes, and incense.', 'Antique Shops: Offering a variety of traditional and historic items.'], 'Working Hours': ['Sunday to Thursday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM.', 'Friday: Closed (opens later after prayers).', 'Saturday: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM.']}
short_description: A traditional market in Riyadh where visitors can explore authentic Saudi goods, antiques, spices, and perfumes.

description: {'Information': ["Al Garawi Galleria features a variety of stores, including luxury fashion brands, children's apparel, sportswear, accessories, and electronics. The mall also offers dining options such as Podium Café and Cup & Cino Café.", 'Location: Situated on Al Urubah Road in the Ar Rahmaniyah district, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.'], 'Main Features': ['Diverse Retail Stores: Offers a wide range of products from clothing to electronics.', 'Dining Options: Includes cafés like Podium Café and Cup & Cino Café.', 'Facilities: Provides amenities such as parking, public restrooms, and ATMs.'], 'Main Shops': ['Luxury Fashion: Stores like Dolce & Gabbana and Versace.', 'Sportswear: Brands such as Adidas and Nike.', "Children's Apparel: Specialized stores for kids' clothing.", 'Electronics: Various shops offering electronic products.'], 'Working Hours': ['Sunday to Thursday: 10:00 AM – 11:00 PM\u200b.', 'Friday: 4:00 PM – 11:00 PM\u200b.', 'Saturday: 10:00 AM – 11:00 PM \u200b.']}

name: Al Faisaliah Mall
description: {'Information': ['Situated within The District Al Faisaliah, Al Faisaliah Mall is a premier shopping destination renowned for its luxury retail brands and world-class dining options.', 'In 2021, the mall underwent a multi-million dollar refurbishment, enhancing its iconic architecture with dramatic curves and a cascading oval roofline. This expansion introduced new retail, entertainment, hospitality, and well-being spaces, blending authentic Saudi heritage with a diverse range of luxury brands and experiences.', 'Location: Al Faisaliah Mall is located on Olaya Street in the Al Olaya district of Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.'], 'Main Features': ['Luxury Retail Brands: The mall hosts an array of high-end international brands, including Cartier, Gucci, Harvey Nichols, Burberry, and more.', 'Fine and Casual Dining: Visitors can enjoy a variety of dining options, from gourmet restaurants like Yauatcha to casual eateries such as Shake Shack and Jolt.', 'Entertainment Facilities: Al Faisaliah Mall features a cinema and spacious seating areas, providing a comfortable environment for relaxation and entertainment.', "Architectural Design: The mall's design includes dramatic curves and a cascading oval roofline, creating a modern and inviting atmosphere."], 'Main Shops': ['Harvey Nichols: A multi-level department store offering a wide range of luxury fashion, beauty products, and accessories.', 'Cartier: Renowned for its exquisite jewelry and timepieces.', 'Gucci: Offers a selection of high-end fashion and accessories.', 'Burberry: Known for its distinctive British luxury apparel and accessories.'], 'Working Hours': ['Al Faisaliah Mall operates from Saturday to Thursday, 10:00 AM to 11:00 PM, and on Fridays from 2:00 PM to 11:00 PM.']}
short_description: A premier luxury shopping and dining destination in Riyadh, featuring high-end brands and diverse culinary experiences.

name: Royal Mall
description: {'Information': ['Royal Mall is a prominent shopping center in Riyadh, known for its extensive collection of over 500 stores featuring both international and local brands.', 'The mall offers a diverse shopping experience, encompassing fashion, beauty, electronics, and home décor. Its modern and luxurious design attracts numerous visitors seeking a comprehensive shopping destination.', 'Location: Royal Mall is situated on King Fahd Branch Road in the Ar Rahmaniyyah district of Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.'], 'Main Features': ["Fashion and Clothing: A wide array of stores catering to women's, men's, and children's apparel, including both luxury designer brands and affordable fashion options.", 'Abaya Collection: Notably, the mall houses numerous shops specializing in abayas, offering a vast selection of styles and price ranges, making it a preferred destination for abaya shopping.', 'Jewelry and Accessories: Multiple stores provide an assortment of jewelry, watches, and fashion accessories to complement various tastes.', "Entertainment: The mall features a children's amusement center and an ice-skating rink, providing recreational activities for families."], 'Main Shops': ["Women's Fashion: Stores like Zara and Mango offer a range of clothing options for different occasions.", 'Abaya Stores: Numerous shops specialize in abayas, providing a vast selection of styles and price ranges.', 'Jewelry Stores: Outlets such as Ghazi Bin Talib Jewelry and Mahir Jewelry offer a variety of jewelry pieces.'], 'Working Hours': ['Royal Mall typically operates from 8:00 AM to 11:30 PM on most days. On Fridays, the mall opens from 1:00 PM to 11:30 PM.']}

name: Movenpick Hotel and Residences Riyadh
description: {'Location': ['Mövenpick Hotel & Residences Riyadh is located at 3478 North Ring Road Exit 4, Al Ghadeer District, Riyadh 13311, Saudi Arabia.'], 'Services and Facilities': ['Dining: The hotel offers five restaurants, including Fez (Moroccan cuisine), La Città (Italian cuisine), Lugano (Swiss cuisine), Mazaj (international buffet), and Café Bonnard.', 'Wellness: Guests can enjoy an outdoor swimming pool, a fitness center with separate facilities for men and women, a sauna, steam room, and massage rooms.', 'Business Amenities: The property features a business center, meeting and banquet facilities, and a 24-hour front desk.', 'Additional Services: Complimentary Wi-Fi, free private parking, airport shuttle services (surcharge), and laundry services are available.'], 'Rooms': ['The hotel offers 269 rooms and suites, as well as 90 residences.', 'Room amenities include air conditioning, a minibar, a safe, a work desk, a 55-inch TV, and access to the fitness center. Residences feature fully equipped kitchens, living and dining areas, and balconies with city views.'], 'Nearby Attractions': ["King Abdullah Financial District (KAFD): Adjacent to the hotel, KAFD is Riyadh's new central business district, offering modern architecture and business hubs.", 'Riyadh Gallery Mall: Located approximately 4.5 km from the hotel, this mall offers various shopping and dining options.', 'King Khalid International Airport: Located approximately 35 km from the hotel, reachable by a 30-minute drive.']}
short_description: Mövenpick Hotel & Residences Riyadh offers luxury, dining, and wellness near KAFD for business and leisure.

name: Ewan Restaurant
description: {'Information:': ['Ewan Restaurant is a luxury restaurant located in Dubai, offering an authentic Arabian dining experience amidst elegant oriental ambiance.'], 'Restaurant Features:': ['Refined Arabian ambiance with luxurious decor.', 'An open buffet featuring the most delicious Arabic and Oriental dishes.', 'A charming view that adds a special touch to the dining experience.'], 'Main courses:': ['Mixed grill.', 'The Mandi and the Card.', 'Fresh seafood.', 'Traditional Arabic sweets.'], 'Working hours:': ['The restaurant is open daily from 12:00 PM to 11:00 PM.']}
short_description: Ewan Restaurant offers a luxurious Arabian dining experience with a diverse buffet in an elegant oriental ambiance.

name: Fairmont Ramla Serviced Residences
description: {'Location': ['Fairmont Ramla Serviced Residences is located at 7713 King Fahad Road, Al Sahafah District, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.'], 'Services and Facilities': ['Dining: The property features multiple dining venues, including Jones The Grocer and The View Lounge.', 'Wellness: Guests can enjoy two outdoor swimming pools, a fitness center, a sauna, and a steam room.', 'Business Amenities: Facilities include modern meeting rooms suitable for various events.', "Additional Services: Complimentary Wi-Fi, free private parking, a 24-hour front desk, concierge services, and a kids' club are available."], 'Rooms': ['The residence offers 249 serviced apartments, ranging from one to three-bedroom units, as well as luxurious penthouses.', 'Each apartment features a fully equipped kitchen, living and dining areas, and a balcony with city or garden views.'], 'Nearby Attractions': ['Riyadh Park Mall: Approximately a 15-minute drive from the property, offering a variety of shopping and dining options.', 'The Boulevard Riyadh: Located about 15 minutes by car, this area features entertainment venues and eateries.', 'King Saud University: This prominent educational institution is easily accessible and situated approximately 9 kilometers away.']}
short_description: Fairmont Ramla Serviced Residences provides luxurious accommodations with panoramic city views, combining elegance and comfort for both short and long-term stays in Riyadh.

name: Wafi Gourmet
description: {'Information:': ['A luxurious restaurant serving authentic Lebanese cuisine with a stunning view of the Burj Khalifa and the Dubai Fountain.'], 'Restaurant Features:': ['Indoor and outdoor seating with a beautiful view.', 'Upscale ambiance suitable for families and groups.', 'Offers fresh Lebanese cuisine and distinctive oriental sweets.'], 'Main courses:': ['Mixed grill', 'Lebanese Shawarma', 'Traditional Lebanese Mezze', 'Kibbeh of all kinds'], 'Working hours:': ['Daily from 10:00 am to 12:00 midnight']}

name: Jareed Hotel Riyadh
description: {'Location': ['Jareed Hotel is situated on Prince Turki Bin Abdulaziz Road within The Boulevard district in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.'], 'Services and Facilities': ['Dining: The hotel features Morini, an Italian restaurant known for its exquisite cuisine. Guests can also relax at The Living Room, a cozy lounge offering a variety of beverages and snacks.', 'Wellness: Amenities include an outdoor swimming pool, a spa offering various treatments, and fitness centers for both men and women.', 'Business Amenities: Facilities include a business center equipped with modern amenities suitable for meetings and events.', "Additional Services: Complimentary Wi-Fi, free private parking, a 24-hour front desk, and airport shuttle services are available for guests' convenience."], 'Rooms': ['The hotel offers 58 rooms, each featuring contemporary design and amenities such as air conditioning, flat-screen TVs, minibars, and private bathrooms with complimentary toiletries. Some rooms include balconies with city views.'], 'Nearby Attractions': ['Riyadh Park Mall: Located about 4 kilometers from the hotel, offering a variety of shopping and dining options.', 'Museum of Illusions: Approximately 5 kilometers away, providing interactive exhibits for all ages.', 'King Khalid International Airport: Located approximately 30 kilometers from the hotel, reachable by a 30-minute drive.']}

name: Mansard Riyadh, a Radisson Collection Hotel
description: {'Location': ['Mansard Riyadh, A Radisson Collection Hotel, is located at 4248 Prince Mohammed Ibn Salman Ibn Abdulaziz Road, Al Rabi District, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.'], 'Services and Facilities': ['Guests can enjoy the on-site spa offering a range of treatments, a fitness center equipped with modern equipment, and an indoor swimming pool.', 'The hotel offers six state-of-the-art meeting rooms overlooking the hotel plaza, suitable for board meetings, training sessions, and lectures, with a capacity for up to 240 attendees.', 'Complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the property, 24-hour room service, concierge services, airport transportation, and free private parking are available for guests.', 'The hotel features multiple dining options, including:', "Sadelle's Riyadh: An all-day dining venue offering international and Arabic dishes.", 'Carbone: A renowned Italian restaurant serving classic dishes.', "L'ami Dave: An upscale French dining experience."], 'Rooms': ['Mansard Riyadh offers 191 accommodations, including guest rooms, serviced apartments, and long-stay villas.', 'Each room is designed with classic European architecture and modern amenities, featuring premium bedding, air conditioning, flat-screen TVs, seating areas, work desks, and private bathrooms with complimentary toiletries.', 'Suites and villas provide additional space and facilities, including separate living areas and kitchenettes.'], 'Nearby Attractions': ['Riyadh Park Mall: Approximately 3 kilometers away, offering a wide range of shopping and dining options.', 'Boulevard City Riyadh: About 5.5 kilometers away, featuring various entertainment, dining, and shopping experiences.', 'Historic Ad Diriyah: Around 9 kilometers from the hotel, this UNESCO World Heritage site showcases the ancestral home of the Saudi State.']}
short_description: A luxurious hotel blending classic European architecture with Arabian hospitality.

name: Danial Star Restaurant

short_description: Danial Star Restaurant offers a diverse open buffet featuring Arabic, Iranian, and Indian cuisines in a sophisticated atmosphere.

name: Hilton Riyadh Hotel & Residences
description: {'Location': ['Hilton Riyadh Hotel & Residences is a luxurious 5-star hotel located at 6623 Al Shohadaa – Eastern Ring Road, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.'], 'Services and Facilities': ['Guests can enjoy two indoor swimming pools, a fitness center, and the Eforea Spa, which offers a range of treatments and wellness services.', 'The hotel boasts 11 flexible meeting rooms and a grand ballroom, suitable for conferences, exhibitions, and social events.', 'Complimentary Wi-Fi, 24-hour room service, concierge services, airport transportation, and free private parking are available for guests.', 'The hotel features multiple dining options, including:', 'Theater: Offers professional buffet-style service and à la carte options.', 'Lotus: Serves Asian cuisine.', 'Anar: Provides contemporary Turkish dishes.'], 'Rooms': ['The hotel offers a variety of accommodations, including guest rooms, suites, and serviced apartments. Each room is equipped with modern amenities such as air conditioning, flat-screen TVs, seating areas, work desks, and private bathrooms with complimentary toiletries.', 'Suites and apartments provide additional space and facilities, including separate living areas and kitchenettes.'], 'Nearby Attractions': ['Granada Mall: Directly connected to the hotel, offering a wide range of shopping and dining options.', 'Granada Business Park: Adjacent to the hotel, providing convenient access for business travelers.', 'Al Nakheel Mall: Approximately 5 kilometers away, featuring numerous retail stores and entertainment facilities.']}
short_description: A luxurious hotel connected to Granada Mall, offering diverse dining options, extensive event spaces, wellness facilities, and modern accommodations in Riyadh.

name: Voco - Riyadh by IHG
description: {'Location': ['voco Riyadh, an IHG Hotel, is situated on King Fahad Road in the heart of Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.'], 'Services and Facilities': ['Guests can enjoy an outdoor swimming pool, a fitness center, and the award-winning Soul Spa & Wellness, which includes whirlpools, massage rooms, a traditional Oriental Hammam, and various tailored treatments.', 'The hotel features 23 versatile meeting venues, ranging from 57 sqm to 1,200 sqm, suitable for conferences, exhibitions, and social events. The Riyadh Grand Ballroom can host receptions for over a thousand guests.', 'Complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the property, 24-hour room service, concierge services, airport transportation, and free private parking are available for guests.', 'The hotel offers a variety of dining options, including:', 'Naya: Lebanese cuisine.', 'Acacia: Italian dishes.', 'Horizon: International buffet.', 'Anardana: Indian specialties.'], 'Rooms': ['voco Riyadh offers 438 air-conditioned rooms and suites, each featuring imaginative design elements, bespoke artwork, and city views.', 'Amenities include comfortable beds with quality linens, spacious workspaces, individual media hubs for USBs and tablets, HD LED TVs, and marble bathrooms with powerful rain showers. Suites provide additional space with separate living rooms, dining areas, kitchens, and some include jacuzzis.'], 'Nearby Attractions': ['Riyadh Golf Courses: Located a short distance away, offering golfing facilities.', 'King Abdul Aziz Library: Approximately 3 kilometers from the hotel, featuring a vast collection of books and manuscripts.', 'National Museum of Saudi Arabia: Approximately 4 kilometers away, exhibiting the history and culture of Saudi Arabia.']}
short_description: An award-winning hotel offering luxurious accommodations, diverse dining options, extensive event spaces, and wellness facilities in the heart of Riyadh.

name: Crowne Plaza Riyadh - RDC Hotel & Convention by IHG
description: {'Location': ["Crowne Plaza Riyadh - RDC Hotel & Convention is located in the heart of Riyadh's Digital City, at Imam Saud Ibn Abdul Aziz Road, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. It's approximately 34 kilometers from King Khalid International Airport, making it accessible for travelers."], 'Services and Facilities': ['Guests can enjoy an outdoor swimming pool, spa, and fitness center to stay healthy and focused during their stay.', 'The hotel boasts 12,000 square meters of event space, including the Sultana ballroom and Siwar Hall, a circular conference center spanning three levels. Additionally, there are 18 state-of-the-art meeting rooms with panoramic views, suitable for various events.', 'Complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the property, a 24-hour front desk, room service, concierge service, airport transportation, and free private parking are available for guests.', 'Dining: The hotel offers multiple dining options, including:', 'KOI: Japanese-Peruvian fine dining.', 'Wildfire: Brazilian cuisine.', 'Mosaique: Local and international dishes.'], 'Rooms': ['Crowne Plaza Riyadh - RDC Hotel & Convention offers a range of accommodations, including Standard Rooms, One-Bedroom Suites, Presidential Suites, Crowne Suites, and Royal Suites.', 'Each room is equipped with modern amenities such as air conditioning, flat-screen TVs, seating areas, work desks, tea and coffee-making facilities, and private bathrooms with complimentary toiletries.'], 'Nearby Attractions': ['U Walk by Arabian Mall: Approximately 3 kilometers from the hotel, offering various shopping and dining options.', 'Hayat Mall: A short distance away, featuring numerous retail stores and entertainment facilities.']}

name: Hilton Riyadh Olaya
description: {'Location': ['Hilton Riyadh Olaya is situated at 8474 King Fahd Road, Al Olaya District, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. The hotel is directly across from Kingdom Centre and is less than five kilometers from Riyadh Gallery Mall, Alkhaimah Theme Park, and King Khalid Grand Mosque. King Khalid International Airport is approximately 19 miles away.'], 'Services and Facilities': ['Guests can enjoy the indoor swimming pool, fitness center, spa, sauna, hot tub, and various massage services.', 'The hotel offers conference facilities, meeting rooms, a business center with internet access, and banquet rooms suitable for various events.', 'Complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the property, 24-hour front desk, room service, concierge service, airport transportation, valet parking, and facilities for disabled guests are available.', 'Regale Bistro & Bar: Offers international cuisine in a family-friendly, modern, and romantic ambiance.', 'Parea Greek Brasserie: Serves Greek dishes, open for brunch, high tea, and cocktail hours, with halal and vegetarian options available.'], 'Rooms': ['Hilton Riyadh Olaya provides a variety of accommodations, including King Rooms, One-Bedroom Residential Suites, Deluxe King Rooms with View, Executive King Rooms with Lounge Access, and Two-Bedroom Suites.', 'Each room is equipped with modern amenities such as air conditioning, flat-screen TVs, seating areas, work desks, tea and coffee-making facilities, and private bathrooms with complimentary toiletries.'], 'Nearby Attractions': ['Riyadh Gallery Mall: Less than five kilometers away, offering a wide range of shopping and dining options.', 'Alkhaimah Theme Park: Also within five kilometers, providing entertainment for families and children.', 'King Khalid Grand Mosque: Located nearby, known for its impressive architecture and spiritual significance.']}
short_description: A 4-star hotel in Riyadh's Al Olaya District, offering luxurious accommodations, diverse dining options, and comprehensive wellness facilities.

name: Vittori Palace Hotel and Residences
description: {'Location': ['Vittori Palace Hotel and Residences is situated at 3091 Al Wedian Al Urubah Road in the King Abdullah District of Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.'], 'Services and Facilities': ['Dining: The hotel offers an on-site restaurant serving a variety of cuisines, including American, seafood, and local dishes. Special diet menus are available upon request.', 'Wellness: Guests can enjoy the spa and wellness center, which includes an indoor swimming pool, sauna, hot tub, and offers various massage services. There are separate health clubs for male and female guests, providing personalized massage, skincare, and body treatments by certified professionals.', 'Business Amenities: The hotel features seven modern meeting and event rooms spanning 500 square meters, suitable for business conferences and social events.', 'Additional Services: Complimentary Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. The hotel also provides a 24-hour front desk, room service, concierge service, airport transportation, and free private parking.'], 'Rooms': ['Vittori Palace Hotel and Residences offers 322 spacious rooms and suites, including the Royal Suite measuring 220 square meters and three types of villas.', 'Each accommodation is designed with comfort in mind, featuring amenities such as air conditioning, flat-screen TVs, minibars, tea and coffee-making facilities, and private bathrooms with complimentary toiletries.'], 'Nearby Attractions': ['Saqr Aljazeera Aviation Museum: Located approximately 4.5 kilometers from the hotel, this museum showcases the history of aviation in Saudi Arabia.', 'Al Nakheel Mall: Situated about 9.2 kilometers away, this mall offers a wide range of shopping and dining options.', 'King Khalid Grand Mosque: Approximately 11 kilometers from the hotel, this mosque is known for its impressive architecture.']}
short_description: A 5-star hotel in Riyadh's King Abdullah District, offering luxurious accommodations, diverse dining options, and comprehensive wellness facilities.
